overview:
Nick Parker has over 25 years of experience in finance positions, and has been closely involved with value creation for shareholders in London Stock Exchange listed companies. Nick is a widely experienced business professional and chartered accountant (Institute of Chartered Accountants in England and Wales) and today serves as WANdisco’s CFO, where he oversees the company’s finance, accounting and investor relations.

Prior to WANdisco, Nick was the Dyson Group PLC CFO for over eight years, and was crucial in transforming Dyson into a high-growth performance materials group. He was previously the Chief Executive of Sheffield Wednesday Football Club, where he transformed and then sold the British soccer team to private investors, and the VP of Corporate Development at Carclo PLC, where he oversaw a large volume of corporate activity with numerous acquisitions and disposals in both the UK and overseas.
